welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mexicali, Mexico! Get ready to experience the city's vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Heidelberg Restaurante
restaurants.description: Heidelberg Restaurante is a german restaurant located in Mexicali.
restaurants.address: Av Francisco I. Madero 1598 (Calle H), 21100 Mexicali, Baja California
